page.title: 12INFORMATION SERVICES
page.content: The Meridian Post started about four years ago.It is run by a comittee of people who give ideas and help with the typing and running of the paper. It is a free paper and four years ago would have given 5000 copies out but now they give out around 1400 copies because of rising production costs. There are a lot of old people in Peacehaven and the Meridian Post is a good way of connecting them with the out-side world. The people who work for the Meridian Post work entirely voluntarily.The paper needs advertisements to keep in business.An advert 14cm by 7cm would cost Â£41 and one 9.5cm by 5.5cm would cost Â£21.An advert on the front or back page costs more money than one in the inside.
